meanings.definition: A person who organizes or plans something.
meanings.sent1: The arrangers of the event made sure everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The arrangers of the school play coordinated the actors and props.
meanings.sent3: The arrangers of the surprise party did a fantastic job keeping it a secret.
meanings.sent4: She was like the arrangers of a symphony, orchestrating each detail perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The arrangers of the wedding created a beautiful and unforgettable ceremony.

meanings.definition: A person who adapts or reworks music for a different medium or style.
meanings.sent1: The arrangers of the song added new instruments to create a unique sound.
meanings.sent2: The arrangers of the musical rearranged the score to fit the smaller orchestra.
meanings.sent3: The arrangers of the jazz piece gave it a funky twist that surprised the audience.
meanings.sent4: He was a master arranger, blending different genres seamlessly in his compositions.
meanings.sent5: The arrangers of the album transformed each track into a work of art.
